column5: Anyone ever fish Kakabikitchiwan(crooked pine) lake at Nestor falls? My wife and I are going there for 3 days before meeting the group to head to our normal lake for the week.

I have put in at Big Pine Lake, just upstream, and 5 portaged in to Kiskutena Lake, and camped, the lakes along the way can be good for small mouth. The lake in question has been fished by friends, a long time ago, they got a number of nice crappies and small mouth, as well as in big Pine. As the planes take off from Kaka, this is something to be aware of, it is a beautiful area. Bill
